attributes.action: Stop Sandwell council building a leisure centre on green belt land
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sandwell council want to build a six lane swimming pool 100 station fitness suite and a large carpark on green belt land left to the people of west bromwich as park/playing fields it is already used by the community for playing football,jogging walking etc

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Sandwell Metropolitan Borough Council.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
